item.title: 9 Things To Know About The Best ‘Blood Moon’ Total Lunar Eclipse Until 2029
item.description: Don't miss the rare total lunar eclipse on March 13-14, 2025, during which the full moon will turn into a stunning "blood moon" for 65 minutes.
